grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 漆芸【シツゲイ】(Japanese) lacquer art
膠漆【コウシツ】glue and lacquer, great intimacy
kun reading compounds: 漆【うるし】lacquer, varnish, japan, lacquer tree (Toxicodendron vernicifluum)
漆塗り【うるしぬり】lacquering, lacquer ware
生漆【きうるし】unrefined sap of the lacquer tree
